title: LP Gains
body:
how do I get my lp back to normal?

I'm new.
I was getting 22 lp for a win , lose 18 for a lose in bronze 5.
I've moved up to bronze4 . win the first 3 games. 2nd last game got 16 lp for win and last game got 14 lp for win. 


MMR is 1042 which is bronze 3 level.

The Average MMR for Bronze 4 40LP is 972.             http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=GOTANYCHICKEN198

I don't understand it . if my mmr is bronze 3 shouldn't my lp be more to move me up to players of the same mmr.

replies.body: As an addition to the other points, occasionally you can get a missmatch of MMR split across teams. Winning games where you have a much higher MMR team you will gain less LP.

**Rito games keeps MMR data a secret**.** Op.GG** makes an **estimated MMR rating** from your ranked games. This means that their** MMR rating** is to only** give you a general idea** of your **current MMR**. You will know your real MMR rating by looking at the LP you win/lose. An **average mmr **would have u **winning/losing 20lp per game**. If you gained** 22 lp per win and 18 per loss**, you were **above average** for a Bronze 5. However when u r**anked up, to Bronze 4**, ur **Real MMR (Not Op.gg's MMR)** was **below average than other players in Bronze 4.** So your lp gains will be a lot less. 

To **fix this problem** you simply need to **win more games**. Your** mmr value increases/decreases on your wins and losses,** if you **win more games**, your **mmr will increase and eventually match the MMR of other players in your division  **

opgg MMR is just a guess, no one except Riot knows your real MMR.

To get good LP gains, you need to get your MMR up as you know. In order to have good MMR, you need to have a good winrate. Your overall winrate is 39%

The system is trying to slow your climbing down because it believes you are not "good enough" for Bronze 3 yet since your winrate is so low. If you were gaining good LP in Bronze 5 but getting crap in Bronze 4, im guessing your REAL MMR is that of a low Bronze 4 person.

Just keep winning my dude and your MMR will go up. If you can maintain your current 55% winrate, it will rise.
